Module.name: Quiller
Module.Setting: type : RETURN_ITEM ; quest_incomplete_dialog : Come back with my CAW! ; quest_complete_dialog : Thank you for finding my CAW. ; name : First CAW! ; desc : Aloha! I might have lost one of my caws, would you please bring it back to me?

type : RETURN_ITEM ; quest_incomplete_dialog : Bah! I know there was a second one! ; quest_complete_dialog : Now I can kill double the people. ; name : More CAWs! ; desc : Now I remember that I actually had two CAWs, but I just remember sitting down. Bring me the other one, NOW!
